profiles.name: monk
profiles.full_name: The Little Kung Fu Monk Man
profiles.describe: The Little Kung Fu Monk Man and protecting his Deva friends with his Brain Knuckles... Brain Knuckles... Brain Knuckles.

profiles.name: indra
profiles.describe: Indra is the main AI in the platform handling all the heavy lifting as you'd call it.

profiles.name: garuda
profiles.describe: Garuda is the security AI in the platform ensuring that all things are as they should be.

profiles.name: francis
profiles.describe: Francis handles mostly just being Friendly and making sure that anything that needs investigating is ivestigated.

profiles.name: puppy
profiles.describe: Hello Puppy sniffs out those things that nobody else can smell, and is super happy to do it too.

profiles.name: raven
profiles.describe: What Raven really does is still quite a mystery, but being the intelligent bird things are sure fun.

profiles.name: robin
profiles.describe: Robin loves to fly around and look for food like spiders, insects, and other things infesting the trees.

profiles.name: squirrel
profiles.describe: Squirrel is super happy to go out and find the craziest nuts in the forest.  He loves hunting for nuts.

profiles.name: turtle
profiles.describe: Turtle is just wonderful to have around.  Looks over things very slowly and with a careful approach of a kind character.

profiles.name: pig
profiles.describe: Mr. Pig is the one who eats everything nobody else will touch, and then he'll turn it into fertilizer for what is to grow next.
